title: Scraped Suprnova.org Bittorrent Feeds
body: <p><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/" title="it's a rss feed jackpot!">These feeds</a> should be useful to anyone looking to </p><del>steal</del> <ins>make backup copies</ins> of their existing stuff.  There are other feeds on the site but these are probably the most useful:<ul><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-anime.rss" title="anime is teh s uck">Anime torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-applications.rss" title="yay applications!">Applications torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-comics.rss" title="meh, comics">Comics torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-games.rss" title="ooo games!">Games torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-mac.rss" title="macs have 3rd party software?">Mac torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-miscellaneous.rss" title="misc ish ish">Miscellaneous torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-movies.rss" title="meh, movies">Movies torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-movies-intl.rss" title="int'l, wtf?">International Movies torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-music.rss" title="yay music!">Music torrent RSS</a></li><li><a href="http://varchars.com/rss/suprnova-tv.rss" title="meh, tv">Television torrent RSS</a></li></ul>
